name: Liquid Lander
description:
Gather upgrades and gain new abilities to traverse through an underground world.

Controls:

Recommended: (WASD + SPACE + ENTER + BACKSPACE)

  • Move - Left/ Right Arrows or A/D
  • Dash (power-up)- Left/Right + Enter  or  A/D  + Enter 
  • Shoot weapon - Backspace / Left Alt
  • Auto Aim (power-up) - Hold  Down Arrow / S
  • Swap Weapon - Press Up Arrow / W

Code:

pxlDae

Art:

Pit, Taks, pxlDae, Rustocrat, CopheeMoth

Music:

Glyphli
